sourcesContent: import React,{useState} from 'react'; import API from '../api'; export default function SubmissionForm({assignmentId,onSubmitted}){ const [content,setContent]=useState(''); const [file,setFile]=useState(null); const submit=async e=>{ e.preventDefault(); const fd=new FormData(); fd.append('content',content); if(file) fd.append('file',file); await API.post(`/submissions/${assignmentId}/submit`, fd); alert('Submitted'); if(onSubmitted) onSubmitted(); }; return (
